info.name: Jumbled Mess Of Colorful Darkness
info.description:
Just a theme for Pokémon Showdown. I feel like the name describes this theme pretty well. Also I don't actually know CSS all that well. I've just looked at and modified other themes for PS so much that I know what to type to get what I want. Feel free to mess with this code, change it up, and give me suggestions. I've credited other themes in the code if I took something from them. Also if I've messed up with licenses, please don't be mad I mean no harm :(

AND MAKE SURE TO USE DARK MODE WITH THIS STYLE

THE MEGA RAYQUAZA DRAWING IN THE STYLE IS DRAWN BY ISHMAM https://www.deviantart.com/ishmam

Here are some cool features with this style:
Animated Weather
Cooler Looking Battles
Cooler Background And Icon (go into the code to change it into what you want)
info.additionalInfo: Edit 1: Changed the way some stuff looks.
